subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Larisa Ilchenko of Russia successfully defended her title at the 10-kilometer open-water world championship in Seville, Spain, and qualified for the Beijing Olympics. Ilchenko swam the four loops of the Guadalquivir River course in 2 hours 2 minutes 2.7 seconds. The event is making its debut at Beijing.
